result.eng: The televison was on in the background but I wasn't watching it much.
result.ga: Bhí an teilifís ar siúl sa chúlra ach ní raibh mé ag féachaint uirthi mórán
result.orig: Bhí an teilifís ar siúl sa chúlra ach ní raibh mé ag féachaint uirthi mórán
result.html: Bhí an teilifís ar siúl sa chúlra ach ní raibh mé ag féachaint uirthi móránThe televison was on in the background but I wasn't watching it much.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an teilifís ar siúl sa ċúlra aċ ní raiḃ mé ag féaċaint uirṫi móránThe televison was on in the background but I wasn't watching it much.

result.eng: She was angry when she heard the news.
result.ga: Bhí fearg uirthi nuair a chuala sí an scéala
result.orig: Bhí fearg uirthi nuair a chuala sí an scéala
result.html: Bhí fearg uirthi nuair a chuala sí an scéalaShe was angry when she heard the news.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí fearg uirṫi nuair a ċuala sí an scéalaShe was angry when she heard the news.

result.eng: She had gold-coloured hair.
result.ga: Bhí folt ar dhath an óir uirthi
result.orig: Bhí folt ar dhath an óir uirthi
result.html: Bhí folt ar dhath an óir uirthiShe had gold-coloured hair.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí folt ar ḋaṫ an óir uirṫiShe had gold-coloured hair.

result.eng: He forced her to give up the child.
result.ga: Chuir sé iachall uirthi an páiste a thabhairt uaithi
result.orig: Chuir sé iachall uirthi an páiste a thabhairt uaithi
result.html: Chuir sé iachall uirthi an páiste a thabhairt uaithiHe forced her to give up the child.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé iaċall uirṫi an páiste a ṫaḃairt uaiṫiHe forced her to give up the child.

result.eng: She was awared a master's degree.
result.ga: Bronnadh céim mháistreachta uirthi
result.orig: Bronnadh céim mháistreachta uirthi
result.html: Bronnadh céim mháistreachta uirthiShe was awared a master's degree.
result.ponchtml: Bronnaḋ céim ṁáistreaċta uirṫiShe was awared a master's degree.

result.eng: The smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.
result.ga: Dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn sí
result.orig: Dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn sí
result.html: Dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn síThe smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.
result.ponchtml: Dá laġad an t-ualaċ atá uirṫi is sásta a ḃíonn síThe smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.

result.eng: His departure hurt her.
result.ga: Ghoil a imeacht uirthi
result.orig: Ghoil a imeacht uirthi
result.html: Ghoil a imeacht uirthiHis departure hurt her.
result.ponchtml: Ġoil a imeaċt uirṫiHis departure hurt her.

result.eng: She calls herself Úna but what is her real name?
result.ga: Tugann sí Úna uirthi féin ach cén t-ainm ceart atá uirthi
result.orig: Tugann sí Úna uirthi féin ach cén t-ainm ceart atá uirthi
result.html: Tugann sí Úna uirthi féin ach cén t-ainm ceart atá uirthiShe calls herself Úna but what is her real name?
result.ponchtml: Tugann sí Úna uirṫi féin aċ cén t-ainm ceart atá uirṫiShe calls herself Úna but what is her real name?

result.eng: She is famous all over the world.
result.ga: Tá cáil uirthi ar fud an domhain
result.orig: Tá cáil uirthi ar fud an domhain
result.html: Tá cáil uirthi ar fud an domhainShe is famous all over the world.
result.ponchtml: Tá cáil uirṫi ar fud an doṁainShe is famous all over the world.

result.eng: She has blond hair.
result.ga: Tá gruaig fhionn uirthi
result.orig: Tá gruaig fhionn uirthi
result.html: Tá gruaig fhionn uirthiShe has blond hair.
result.ponchtml: Tá gruaig ḟionn uirṫiShe has blond hair.

result.eng: She has short hair.
result.ga: Tá gruaig ghearr uirthi
result.orig: Tá gruaig ghearr uirthi
result.html: Tá gruaig ghearr uirthiShe has short hair.
result.ponchtml: Tá gruaig ġearr uirṫiShe has short hair.

result.eng: She is happy.
result.ga: Tá áthas uirthi
result.orig: Tá áthas uirthi
result.html: Tá áthas uirthiShe is happy.
result.ponchtml: Tá áṫas uirṫiShe is happy.

result.eng: She became afraid of (her own) death.
result.ga: Tháinig eagla a báis uirthi
result.orig: Tháinig eagla a báis uirthi
result.html: Tháinig eagla a báis uirthiShe became afraid of (her own) death.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig eagla a báis uirṫiShe became afraid of (her own) death.

result.eng: Máire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.
result.ga: Luigh Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthi
result.orig: Luigh Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthi
result.html: Luigh Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthiMáire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.
result.ponchtml: Luiġ Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular ṫit néal ar biṫ codlata uirṫiMáire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.

result.eng: He surprised her! That was nasty of him.
result.ga: Tháinig sé aniar aduaidh uirthi Ba ghránna an mhaise dó é
result.orig: Tháinig sé aniar aduaidh uirthi Ba ghránna an mhaise dó é
result.html: Tháinig sé aniar aduaidh uirthi Ba ghránna an mhaise dó éHe surprised her! That was nasty of him.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sé aniar aduaiḋ uirṫi Ba ġránna an ṁaise dó éHe surprised her! That was nasty of him.

result.eng: She was excited: she was working in the most pioneering café in Ireland.
result.ga: Bhí dinglis pléisiúir uirthi bhí sí ag obair sa chaife ba cheannródaí in Éirinn
result.orig: Bhí dinglis pléisiúir uirthi bhí sí ag obair sa chaife ba cheannródaí in Éirinn
result.html: Bhí dinglis pléisiúir uirthi bhí sí ag obair sa chaife ba cheannródaí in ÉirinnShe was excited: she was working in the most pioneering café in Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí dinglis pléisiúir uirṫi ḃí sí ag obair sa ċaife ba ċeannródaí in ÉirinnShe was excited: she was working in the most pioneering café in Ireland.

result.eng: She still felt nauseous from the incident.
result.ga: Bhí masmas uirthi fós de thoradh na heachtra
result.orig: Bhí masmas uirthi fós de thoradh na heachtra
result.html: Bhí masmas uirthi fós de thoradh na heachtraShe still felt nauseous from the incident.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí masmas uirṫi fós de ṫoraḋ na heaċtraShe still felt nauseous from the incident.

result.eng: Your thumb is bleeding. Put a plaster on it, for God's sake!
result.ga: Tá d'ordóg ag cur fola Cuir greimlín uirthi go beo
result.orig: Tá d'ordóg ag cur fola Cuir greimlín uirthi go beo
result.html: Tá d'ordóg ag cur fola Cuir greimlín uirthi go beoYour thumb is bleeding. Put a plaster on it, for God's sake!
result.ponchtml: Tá d'ordóg ag cur fola Cuir greimlín uirṫi go beoYour thumb is bleeding. Put a plaster on it, for God's sake!

result.eng: She only had herself to blame.
result.ga: Mhill sí uirthi féin é
result.orig: Mhill sí uirthi féin é
result.html: Mhill sí uirthi féin éShe only had herself to blame.
result.ponchtml: Ṁill sí uirṫi féin éShe only had herself to blame.

result.eng: It seems she only had one duty.
result.ga: Ní raibh ach dualgas amháin uirthi is cosúil
result.orig: Ní raibh ach dualgas amháin uirthi is cosúil
result.html: Ní raibh ach dualgas amháin uirthi is cosúilIt seems she only had one duty.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ aċ dualgas aṁáin uirṫi is cosúilIt seems she only had one duty.

result.eng: Along with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ga: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.orig: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.html: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadhAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ponchtml: Fara aire a ṫaḃairt don leanḃ ḃí uirṫi an teaċ a ġlanaḋAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.

result.eng: She had responsibility for the cooking, the washing and the ironing.
result.ga: Bhí cúram na cócaireachta an níocháin is na hiarnála uirthi
result.orig: Bhí cúram na cócaireachta an níocháin is na hiarnála uirthi
result.html: Bhí cúram na cócaireachta an níocháin is na hiarnála uirthiShe had responsibility for the cooking, the washing and the ironing.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cúram na cócaireaċta an níoċáin is na hiarnála uirṫiShe had responsibility for the cooking, the washing and the ironing.

result.eng: She was told that she would have to pay €500 to the government.
result.ga: Dúradh léi go mbeadh uirthi €500 a íoc leis an rialtas
result.orig: Dúradh léi go mbeadh uirthi €500 a íoc leis an rialtas
result.html: Dúradh léi go mbeadh uirthi €500 a íoc leis an rialtasShe was told that she would have to pay €500 to the government.
result.ponchtml: Dúraḋ léi go mbeaḋ uirṫi €500 a íoc leis an rialtasShe was told that she would have to pay €500 to the government.

result.eng: Laughing even though she didn't want to.
result.ga: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthi
result.orig: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthi
result.html: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthiLaughing even though she didn't want to.
result.ponchtml: Ag déanaṁ gáire naċ raiḃ a ḟonn uirṫiLaughing even though she didn't want to.

result.eng: I've known her long time.
result.ga: Tá seanaithne agamsa uirthi
result.orig: Tá seanaithne agamsa uirthi
result.html: Tá seanaithne agamsa uirthiI've known her long time.
result.ponchtml: Tá seanaiṫne agamsa uirṫiI've known her long time.

result.eng: He grabbed her by her hair.
result.ga: Fuair sé greim gruaige uirthi
result.orig: Fuair sé greim gruaige uirthi
result.html: Fuair sé greim gruaige uirthiHe grabbed her by her hair.
result.ponchtml: Fuair sé greim gruaige uirṫiHe grabbed her by her hair.

result.eng: She was breaking into tears.
result.ga: Bhí an gol ag briseadh uirthi
result.orig: Bhí an gol ag briseadh uirthi
result.html: Bhí an gol ag briseadh uirthiShe was breaking into tears.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an gol ag briseaḋ uirṫiShe was breaking into tears.

result.eng: He eyes were closing with sleep.
result.ga: Bhí na súile ag drud uirthi leis an chodladh
result.orig: Bhí na súile ag drud uirthi leis an chodladh
result.html: Bhí na súile ag drud uirthi leis an chodladhHe eyes were closing with sleep.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na súile ag drud uirṫi leis an ċodlaḋHe eyes were closing with sleep.

result.eng: She will be wondering why you want that information.
result.ga: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sin
result.orig: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sin
result.html: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sinShe will be wondering why you want that information.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ iontas uirṫi cad ċuige a ḃfuil tú den eolas sinShe will be wondering why you want that information.

result.eng: What happened to her?
result.ga: Goidé tháinig uirthi
result.orig: Goidé tháinig uirthi
